comments:
Reported in the eclipse.webtools newsgroup (3/14/05)Gary
Mohr<Gary.Mohr@bull.com> and (03/16/05)Johannes Poulsen<poulsenj@worldonline.dk>


The log shows a NPE when user selects a server other than the known servers;
Tomcat v.50 etc.
